item.description:
Spend Sunday afternoon having fun playing Mexican Train Dominoes. If you do not know how to play, we'll teach you. It's easy and fun!

If you have a Scrabble game and would like to bring it, let us know and we can offer that too. Just post it in the comments section below.

Meet for lunch first at the Cafe in Tatnuck. They have great food selections (hot and cold sandwiches, salads, soups, lattes, pastry, and more...)

Lunch: 12:30 pm -2:00 pm

Games: 2:00 pm - 5:00 pm

Come for whatever you like, lunch, games and/or both.
item.name: Lunch, Dominoes and Scrabble
